title: Consider the Tools
text: Think about the tools that are commonly used in data analysis. Are there any software or programming languages that are known for handling large datasets?

title: Efficiency Matters
text: When dealing with large datasets, efficiency is key. Consider methods that can process data quickly and accurately.

hintAnswer: Using statistical software like R or Python.
title: Software Solutions
text: Which software is known for its statistical analysis capabilities and is widely used in data science?
choices: Using statistical software like R or Python.
